AzureAD.AppIdScope: api://[replace this with the application id (guid) of the Service application]/.default

AzureAD.Domain: domain name of your Azure AD Tenant. e.g. jobplaygroundad.onmicrosoft.com
AzureAD.TenantId: id (guid) of your Azure AD Tenant
AzureAD.ClientId: application id (guid) of your application in the Azure AD Tenant
